QuestData.Title: Gava'xi
QuestData.Description: The presence of rogue ethereals in this area might amuse Gezhe, who sees nothing but opportunity wherever we go, but it's a true threat to the security of our operations.$B$BTheir leader, Gava'xi, is a dangerous criminal and I've made it my top priority to see to it that he is neutralized.$B$BIf you're looking to make yourself useful, go and take care of Gava'xi. I will see to it that you're rewarded properly.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Gava'xi near Oshu'gun and return to Zerid at Aeris Landing in Nagrand.
QuestData.RewardText: We won't have to worry about Gava'xi anymore, thanks to you. Let us arrange for your reward now.
